If you are so inclined, please help spread the word that my squad and I are looking for a new team member to join us over here at BIG YAM. In all honesty, we've struggled a bit to find someone who is a great fit and who has the writing chops to hit the ground running. But we know our future Comms Squad person is out there!

So, if you know of a talented AE-type PR professional, one who has at least 3-5 years under his or her belt and agency experience, I hope you will send them our way. We promise to pay them well, grow them professionally, feed them continually and be great colleagues.

The Phoenix Business Journal is hiring. We have an immediate opening for an experienced reporter to cover local issues impacting Valley businesses. If you are interested, Email me at ilowery@bizjournals.com, and  I can send you the job description.

Working with a talented crew of go-getters at BIG YAM, an award-winning integrated digital marketing firm owned by visionary business leader and philanthropist, Bob Parsons. What does YAM stand for you might ask? Well, it is an endearing east-coaster term, You're a Mess, but we mean that in the nicest possible way. Unless of course your marketing is a real mess. Then you might want to give us a call and see how we can help you Brand Fearlessly.

Carol is one of my favorite people at OMA -- even before I was hired on. Prior to coming to OMA, I met Carol when she was the CRM of our account when I was working on the client side at another job. Knowing her played a big part in my decision to leave the client side and ultimately work for OMA.Now I get to work with her daily at and its been a pleasure. Carol lives for PR and is tireless in the work she does for her clients. Although she is the Director of our PR team, she also gets down in the trenches with everyone to execute campaigns. Typically, I bounce ideas off of Carol for social media marketing and brand management when kicking off a new campaign for a client. Carol is awesome!

I have worked directly with Carol on integrated PR/digital initiatives for a variety of clients in multiple industries -- from consumer brands to healthcare to B2B to cause marketing. No matter the project, Carol brings a dedication to her clients and an understanding of their needs that is truly phenomenal.In her role as director of Off Madison Ave's PR group, Carol has built a team of professional, highly experienced communicators who understand the changing face of PR. But what I appreciate most about working with Carol is that she's not afraid to get her hands dirty with real client work, not just new business pitches and annual planning -- which gives our clients the benefit of a highly skilled, strategic PR executive working directly on their campaigns, all year round.

Shanna is one of those rare PR practitioners who excels in every aspect of the business. She has amazing media relations skills and is always thinking of great story angles to keep her clients in the news. Her crisis communication work is also stellar as she's seen and dealt with countless situations, and has helped clients successfully navigate these issues. And, speaking of clients, Shanna continually goes above and beyond to serve clients, be available at a moment's notice, support them and give them great counsel. Lastly, her expertise in the hospitality, travel and tourism space is remarkable! I truly enjoyed working with Shanna at Off Madison Ave and have also enjoyed watching her skyrocket in her PR career.

summary: PR and marketing executive with a professional focus on healthcare, travel and tourism, consumer products and government. I specialize in crisis management and communications for highly regulated industries, including healthcare, education and tribal government. My passion is helping clients tell their story through compelling content, effective social media marketing and proactive media relations.Additional areas of expertise include: - Pitching top 100 markets with proven results- Logistics and planning for large-scale events- Content strategy and planning- Social media marketing and campaigns- Crisis communications scenario planning- Google analytics management and reporting- WordPress site development- Special event photography- Media and PR 101 training- Strategy workshops
